com.qrmedia.commons.multispi.provider
Interface ServiceImplementationProvider

All Known Implementing Classes:
AnnotationScanningProvider, MetaInfServicesProvider, ServiceClassnameAttributeProvider
public interface ServiceImplementationProvider

Finds implementations of a service interface or abstract class.

Since:
4 Dec 2010
Author:
aphillips

Method Summary
 Set<String> findServiceImplementations(Class<?> serviceClass)
          Returns a set of fully-qualified class names of implementations of the given service class.
 

Method Detail

findServiceImplementations

@Nonnull
Set<String> findServiceImplementations(@Nonnull
                                               Class<?> serviceClass)
Returns a set of fully-qualified class names of implementations of the given service class. Is not required to check if the classes returned actually implement the requested interface or abstract class. Never returns null.

Parameters:
serviceClass - the (non-null) requested service class
Returns:
a non-null set of fully-qualified class names of presumed implementations of the requested service
